channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Bad Moms
channel.desc: Comedy 2016 Driven to the brink by ceaseless obligations and a lack of appreciation, three weary mothers choose rebellion, not out of anger, but in pursuit of long-overdue joy, liberation, and moments of indulgence that are finally about them. Mila Kunis, Kathryn Hahn, Kristen Bell, Christina Applegate, Jada Pinkett Smith, Scott Moore, Jon Lucas, Jon Lucas, Scott Moore.
